---
title: "Google Forms Course"
---

### Author

- Sean Kross

### Description

An example course that instructors can use as a template for collecting students'
progress through a swirl course. This approach is recommended for courses that 
are taught in person.

### Installation

```r
swirl::install_course_github("seankross", "Google_Forms_Course")
```

### Website

- https://github.com/seankross/Google_Forms_Course
